content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft iron gear wheels directly because they require a specific crafting machine, such as an assembler, rather than being crafted directly from the inventory.
# This means I need to craft an assembling machine first before I can produce iron gear wheels.

# I will check the recipe for the assembling machine to see what materials are required for crafting it.
recipe_assembling_machine = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.AssemblingMachine)  # Check the recipe for the assembling machine.
print(recipe_assembling_machine)  # Display the ingredients needed for crafting an assembling machine.

# After checking the recipe, I will gather the necessary materials and craft the assembling machine.
# I will also need to ensure I have enough iron plates and any other required materials for the assembly process. 

# Let's proceed to craft the assembling machine now that I have the information.
ensure_craftable(Prototype.AssemblingMachine, quantity=1)  # Ensure I have the materials to craft one assembling machine.
assembling_machine = craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine, quantity=1)  # Craft one assembling machine.
print(f"Inventory after crafting an assembling machine: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again.
